long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
iTab-Redefine Your New Tab
 
To embrace the beauty of nature, to feel the convenience of technology with iTab.
 
iTab can make your Chrome start page beautiful and improve your efficiency. Finish installation with one click, be a designer and explorer right NOW!
 
Touch of Nature
Have you ever dreamed of travelling around the world? To embrace the magnificence of ice world, feel the passionate of desert, dive into the deep ocean…Discover a new world with us! High-quality wallpapers with spectacular natural views, be an explorer with every browser new tab!
 
World Within Reach
Manage your favorite websites and put them to the start screen for a faster access. One click, like a wizard wave his wand, the whole world is at your fingertips.
 
Be a Designer NOW
Tired of the boring dashboard and plain start page? Create the world of your own! Change layouts and styles as you please, join us and be a designer NOW!
